hackathons.name: Hack This Fall 2025 – Build Station
hackathons.description: Participated in Hack This Fall 2025 at Microsoft Hyderabad, collaborating with developers to build innovative solutions under 48-hour time pressure. Worked with cutting-edge tools like Apify for web automation, GitHub for version control, and Vultr for cloud deployment. Gained hands-on experience in teamwork, rapid prototyping, and full-stack + AI development in a real hackathon environment.

hackathons.name: Indian Blockchain Tour - Hyderabad
hackathons.description: Attended the Indian Blockchain Tour in Hyderabad, an exclusive networking event bringing together blockchain enthusiasts, developers, and industry leaders. Engaged in insightful discussions about the future of Web3, discovered emerging blockchain projects, and connected with like-minded innovators. The event featured expert talks, networking sessions, and exclusive swags celebrating blockchain innovation.

hackathons.name: HackPrix 2025
hackathons.description: Competed in HackPrix 2025, an intense 36-hour coding marathon at Lords Institute of Engineering and Technology. Demonstrated long-lasting performance and exceptional teamwork to build innovative solutions. Pushed through the challenge with dedication, creativity, and technical excellence, showcasing the ability to deliver under extended time constraints.

hackathons.name: Genaiversity Hackathon
hackathons.description: Participated in the Genaiversity AI-focused hackathon, working on innovative generative AI solutions. Collaborated with talented developers to build cutting-edge AI applications and explore the latest in machine learning and artificial intelligence technologies.

hackathons.name: Monad Blitz Hackathon
hackathons.description: Competed in the Monad Blitz hackathon, a Web3 blockchain development competition focused on building high-performance decentralized applications on the Monad blockchain. Worked on creating innovative smart contracts and exploring Layer 1 blockchain solutions.

hackathons.name: Datanyx 2024
hackathons.description: Participated in Datanyx 2024, an exhilarating 24-hour coding marathon at MJCET. Experienced the thrill of non-stop development, problem-solving, and innovation. The event was a perfect blend of intense coding sessions, strategic power naps, and collaborative brainstorming. Enjoyed every moment of the hackathon culture – from midnight debugging to early morning breakthroughs, making it an unforgettable coding experience.

hackathons.name: Jupiverse Hackathon by HyderabadDAO
hackathons.description: Participated in the Jupiverse hackathon organized by HyderabadDAO, focusing on Web3 innovation and decentralized applications. Built solutions leveraging blockchain technology and explored DeFi protocols, NFTs, and decentralized governance systems.

hackathons.name: Mahindra University Aeon Fest Hackathon
hackathons.description: Competed in the Aeon Fest hackathon at Mahindra University, a premier Web3 and blockchain development competition. Worked on innovative decentralized solutions and collaborated with industry experts to build next-generation blockchain applications.
